ðŸ“– Summary: Web-Check is an all-in-one OSINT tool designed for comprehensive website analysis. It uncovers potential attack vectors, analyzes server architecture, reveals security configurations, and identifies the technologies used by a site. The tool provides insights into various aspects, including IP information, SSL chain, DNS records, cookies, headers, domain information, and more, aiming to help users understand, optimize, and secure their websites.
